clinical_study.brief_title: Developement and Evaluation of Serological Assays for COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Developement and Evaluation of Serological Assays for COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study aims to evaluate serological assays of virus Covid-19.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a retrospective monocentric study, which will include the patients who have hospitalized in Ambroise Paré Hospital and have sampling sent to the Laboratory of Microbiology of the hospital between the 15 March 2020 and 30 september 2020.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout of the study, an average of 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Determination of sensibility and specificity of serological testing in SARS-CoV-2 virus in patients with acute respiratory symptoms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Delay between the first symptoms and the positive serological result
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout of the study, an average of 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Delay between the first symptoms and the positive serological result of SARS-CoV-2 virus.

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients with positive or negative molecular diagnosis of Covid-19, in the Laboratory of Microbiology of Ambroise Paré Hospital.

overall_official.affiliation: Laboratoire de Microbiologie Hygiène hospitalière, Hôpital Ambroise paré, APHP
